name: Saul Bright
description: Saul Brightis the leader of theAldecaldosgroup that roams theBadlandsaroundNight City. Fellow AldecaldoPanam Palmeridolized Saul during his more adventurous days, fondly remembering stories about him moving civilians across the border during a bombardment or hijacking aPetrochemtanker, opening the valves, cranking a few eights to set the desert ablaze and give the kids a fun show. Saul assumed leadership of an Aldecaldos packwhen they were in a fragile state, so bad that one mistake could have caused them to lose everything.
